page.title: 13S/N: Media - The Parish News
page.content: The "Parish News" which appears monthly (except August) was first issued in 1973 and is now established as a very useful means of communi- cation. Published and printed by Scotton Parish Church the Parish News is delivered free of charge to every house in the parishes of Scotton and Northorpe; it costs about Â£10 an issue to produce (partly offset by advertise -ments from local tradesmen). The mag- azine opens with a 2-3 page message from the incumbent; there is often an item by the local Methodist minister. Christenings, confirmations, marriages and deaths are recorded and details given of church services at Scotton and Northorpe and other church activ- ities: from the Bible Study Group to the rota for church cleaning. It also gives news of general village events and club activities.
